# Roots
I was born in Austin, Texas, and raised there for a while before moving to Laredo at the age of nine. I'm the youngest of five siblings, and I enjoy writing short horror stories when I'm not working on projects in the data science and video game space.
<br>
<br>

# Work
I currently work as a full-time Software Engineer at a multinational corporation in Houston. My duties include maintaining existing core systems and engineering new developments utilizing the underlying framework that has been laid out.
<br>
<br>

# School
## Texas A&M University - B.S. Computer Science
### College Station, TX
I attended Texas A&M from 2014 - 2019, and earned a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with an emphasis in algorithms and a capstone in gamified education and handwriting recognition in foreign languages. In addition to my core coursework, I completed a minor in Film Studies.
<br>

## Southern Methodist University - M.S. Data Science, Expected 2025
### Dallas, TX
I currently attend Southern Methodist University in Dallas, where I am working towards my a master's degree in Data Science with a specialization in Machine Learning.
